entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switch does not properly handle cancelling of toggle event #14774
  • Linear Gradients constantly have a grey hue in .net Maui on iOS #14766
  • EllipseGeometry binding not working #14764
  • [BUG] Can not debug MacCatalyst app when CodeSigning is enabled #14762
  • ScrollToAsync method not working considering the ScrollView's Orientation on iOS. #14761
  • CarouselView does not work on Windows #14760
  • CarouselView does not go backwards more than the number of times it went forward! #14759
  • Crash caused by DateTime.TryParse MacCatalyst signed Release only #14758

Closed

  • Creating "bottom sheet dialog" doesn't render correctly #6445
    Backlog
  • VisualStateManager Works Differently on Windows and Android #6629
    Backlog
  • Cant debug on real Android API 21 Device #5782
    Backlog
  • Editor WidthRequest does not work on iOS #5792
    Backlog
  • Expose the types/interfaces in Maui Essentials as a separate library targeting net6.0 #5914
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .net MAUI FlexLAyout do not display correctly in .NET 7 framework with Android #14500
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • XmlSerializer iOS #14751

PullRequests

Created

  • [core] use ToUpperInvariant() / ToLowerInvariant() #14773
  • Create better helpers for attaching and fix Window #14772
  • Transition away from implicit package references #14770
  • Bump Mono.Cecil from 0.11.4 to 0.11.5 #14768
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Update All (most) BindableProperty XML docs #14704
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [7.0.2xx-sr6] Update net6 version #14769
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517
  • Call the correct Disconnect method from DisconnectHandler #14757
    backport/suggested

Updated

  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Correctly re-apply font formatting to HTML text #14701
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested
  • Don't measure text spans if type is HTML #14705
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
